long_description: The Osprey Poco Plus child carrier incorporates cutting-edge pack design to create a kid hauler you can count on for comfort, durability and user-friendly features. For the adult, Poco Plus features a ventilated, tensioned mesh back panel, effortless torso adjustment and a wide range of adjustability for the plushly padded hipbelt. Your child will enjoy the ride in a soft, ventilated and height-adjustable cockpit; padded, secure shoulder straps feature buckles that attach out of the child's reach. Child's cockpit is surrounded by padded framing and features adjustable stirrups for a comfortable ride. Drool pad is machine-washable and easy to remove. Hydration sleeve behind the back panel holds a reservoir of your choice (reservoir sold separately). Plenty of pockets and a spacious storage compartment make it a simple endeavor to pack and organize snacks, drinks, clothes and other essentials. Strong, powder-coated aluminum frame with injection molded hinges stands upright on the ground and folds easily for storage or travel. The Osprey Poco Plus child carrier features an innovative, built-in sunshade that quickly folds flat to stow away in a zippered pocket when not in use.
short_description: The Osprey Poco Plus child carrier incorporates cutting-edge pack design to create a kid hauler you can count on for comfort, durability and user-friendly features.
